thread.title: Address challenges credibly: India to Nepal
thread.title_full: Address challenges credibly: India to Nepal

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Address challenges credibly: India to Nepal
text: India on Sunday told Nepal that it was looking forward to steps being taken by its government to ‘credibly’ address the challenges faced by the country, including in the Terai region, at the earliest In the first high-level engagement after the establishment of the new dispensation in Nepal, External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj met Nepalese Deputy PM Kamal Thapa, who briefed her about the current political situation in his country and expressed hope of finding a solution to the present turmoil soon — PTI
